title: Improve WhatsApp prefilled message from Contact form

requirements.summary: Include all submitted contact form fields in the post-submit WhatsApp deep-link message, always using the configured contact-form WhatsApp number.
acceptanceCriteria: After submitting the Contact form successfully, clicking "Continue on WhatsApp" opens a wa.me link that uses siteConfig.whatsapp.contactFormNumber (not the general site WhatsApp number).
The prefilled WhatsApp message includes labeled lines for Name, Email, Phone, and Message.
If the user did not enter a phone number, the message still includes a Phone line with a clear placeholder (e.g., "Phone: Not provided").
The WhatsApp message formatting uses line breaks so each field is easy to scan in WhatsApp.

file_operations.description: Add a small helper (e.g., a formatter) to build a copy/paste-friendly, line-break-separated WhatsApp message for contact-form submissions (Name/Email/Phone/Message), ensuring the Phone line is always present with a clear placeholder when empty. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Update the post-success "Continue on WhatsApp" link generation to use siteConfig.whatsapp.contactFormNumber and the new/updated formatter so the prefilled text always includes labeled lines for Name, Email, Phone (or "Not provided"), and Message with readable line breaks. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
